physical_appearance: This is a 4-page typescript paper publication. It consists of two sheets of paper. The titles and illustrations are handwritten and drawn in coloured inks, while the articles are typed. The title of the publication is printed at the top-left of the bottom page, in blue, with the publication date and issue printed below it. The clipping is slightly browned, and is folded especially along the corners.
sgcool_label_text: """Prisoners Post. No. 1"" is a 4-page typescript paper with hand-written titles and captions
title_text: Prisoners Post. No. 1 (2 pieces) Prisoners' Post. No. 1
